      • getMinesSurrounding

        public int getMinesSurrounding(int row,
                               int column)
        gets the amount of mines that are surrounding the box selected
        Parameters:
        row - - row location
        column - - column location
        Returns:
        - returns an int with the amount of mines surrounding the box, if it is a mine it returns -1
